description.value: The Dragon does not roll initiative. It has set initiative counts of 20, 30, and 40, and it takes a turn on each count. It cannot delay or ready actions.

Basic Attack

At-Will

Standard

Attack: Melee 4 (one creature)

+38 vs. AC

Hit: 6d8 + 14 damage, and the target loses all necrotic and psychic resistance (save ends).

At-Will

Standard

Attack: Melee 4 (one creature)

+38 vs. AC

Hit: 6d10 + 8 damage, and the target is immobilized (save ends).

Aftereffect: The target is slowed (save ends).

At-Will âœ¦ necrotic

Standard

Attack: Close burst 5 (creatures in the burst)

+36 vs. Fortitude

Hit: 4d10 + 9 necrotic damage.

At-Will

Standard

Attack: Close blast 4 (enemies in the blast)

+38 vs. AC

Hit: 4d8 + 13 damage, and the Dragon slides the target 2 squares.

Recharge when the Dragon hits with Dragon's defiling âœ¦ necrotic

Standard

Attack: Ranged 10 (one creature)

+37 vs. Fortitude

Hit: 6d10 + 10 necrotic damage, and ongoing 20 necrotic damage (save ends).

First Failed Saving Throw: The ongoing necrotic damage is 30 instead of 20.

system.rechargeCondition: when the Dragon hits with Dragon's defiling

description.value:
Encounter

Standard

Requirement: The Dragon must be bloodied.

Attack: Close blast 20 (creatures in the blast)

+37 vs. Reflex

Hit: 6d10 + 8 damage.

Miss: Half damage.

Encounter âœ¦ force

Standard

Attack: Close burst 5 (creatures in the burst)

+37 vs. Fortitude

Hit: 6d10 + 8 force damage, and the Dragon pushes the target 5 squares and knocks it prone.

Miss: Half damage, and the Dragon pushes the target 3 squares.

At-Will

Move

Effect: The Dragon pushes each enemy adjacent to it 2 squares and then the Dragon flies its speed + 2.

At-Will

Triggered

Trigger: An enemy ends its movement within 4 squares of the Dragon.

Attack (Immediate Reaction): Melee 4 (the triggering enemy)

+37 vs. Reflex

Hit: 6d8 + 14 damage, and the target falls prone.

Encounter

Triggered

Trigger: The Dragon is first bloodied.

Effect (Free Action): Telekinetic pulse recharges, and the Dragon uses it.

AC 47Fort 46Ref 43Will 47
Speed 10, fly 10 (hover), teleport 5
Ability ScoresStr 29 (+25)
Con 32 (+27)		Dex 28 (+25)

Cha 35 (+28)
Languages Common, Draconic, Supernal
Alignment Chaotic Evil
Senses Darkvision
Passive Perception 35 | Insight 35
